original_text: He took the image he had made and put it in God’s temple, of which God had said to David and to his son Solomon, “In this temple and in Jerusalem, which I have chosen out of all the tribes of Israel, I will put my Name forever.
korean_text: 또 자기가 만든 아로새긴 목상을 하나님의 전에 세웠더라 옛적에 하나님이 이 성전에 대하여 다윗과 그의 아들 솔로몬에게 이르시기를 내가 이스라엘 모든 지파 중에서 택한 이 성전과 예루살렘에 내 이름을 영원히 둘지라

sentences.original_text: He took the image he had made
and put it in God's temple
of which God had said to David
In this temple and in Jerusalem
which I have chosen out of all the tribes of Israel
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 이스라엘의 모든 지파 중에서 택한 바에서

sentences.original_text: I will put my Name forever
